Title: Relates to school bus stop-arm cameras
Summary: Relates to school bus stop-arm cameras; makes technical amendments thereto.
LawCode: Amd §§1174-a & 1180-e, V & T L; amd §370, Gen Muni L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the vehicle and traffic law, in relation to school bus stop-arm cameras; and to amend the general municipal law, in relation to the establishment of traffic violations bureaus
